parameter.name: expirationPolicy
parameter.description: Configures the minimum amount of time that a dynamic configuration instance can remain idle before the runtime considers it eligible for expiration. This does not mean that the platform will expire the instance at the exact moment that it becomes eligible. The runtime will actually purge the instances when it sees it fit.

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

parameter.name: consumerKey
parameter.description: The OAuth consumerKey as registered with the service provider

parameter.name: consumerSecret
parameter.description: The OAuth consumerSecret as registered with the service provider

parameter.name: authorizationUrl
parameter.description: The service provider's authorization endpoint URL

parameter.name: accessTokenUrl
parameter.description: The service provider's accessToken endpoint URL

parameter.name: scopes
parameter.description: The OAuth scopes to be requested during the dance. If not provided, it will default to those in the annotation

parameter.name: resourceOwnerId
parameter.description: The resourceOwnerId which each component should use if it doesn't reference otherwise.

parameter.name: before
parameter.description: The name of a flow to be executed right before starting the OAuth dance

parameter.name: after
parameter.description: The name of a flow to be executed right after an accessToken has been received

parameter.name: listenerConfig
parameter.description: A reference to a <http:listener-config /> to be used in order to create the listener that will catch the access token callback endpoint.

parameter.name: callbackPath
parameter.description: The path of the access token callback endpoint

parameter.name: authorizePath
parameter.description: The path of the local http endpoint which triggers the OAuth dance

parameter.name: externalCallbackUrl
parameter.description: If the callback endpoint is behind a proxy or should be accessed through a non direct URL, use this parameter to tell the OAuth provider the URL it should use to access the callback

parameter.name: objectStore
parameter.description: A reference to the object store that should be used to store each resource owner id's data. If not specified, runtime will automatically provision the default one.

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

parameter.name: consumerSecret
parameter.description: The OAuth consumerSecret as registered with the service provider

parameter.name: authorizationUrl
parameter.description: The service provider's authorization endpoint URL

parameter.name: accessTokenUrl
parameter.description: The service provider's accessToken endpoint URL

parameter.name: scopes
parameter.description: The OAuth scopes to be requested during the dance. If not provided, it will default to those in the annotation

parameter.name: resourceOwnerId
parameter.description: The resourceOwnerId which each component should use if it doesn't reference otherwise.

parameter.name: before
parameter.description: The name of a flow to be executed right before starting the OAuth dance

parameter.name: after

parameter.name: listenerConfig

parameter.name: externalCallbackUrl
parameter.description: If the callback endpoint is behind a proxy or should be accessed through a non direct URL, use this parameter to tell the OAuth provider the URL it should use to access the callback

parameter.name: objectStore

operation.name: channelInfo
operation.description:
Returns information about a team channel.

To retrieve information on a private channel, use group-info operation.

parameter.name: channel
parameter.description: Channel to get info on

parameter.name: includeLocale
parameter.description: Set this to true to receive the locale for this channel. Defaults to false

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: groupInfo
operation.description: This operation returns information about a private channel.

parameter.name: channel
parameter.description: Private channel to get info on

parameter.name: includeLocal
parameter.description: Set this to true to receive the locale for this group. Defaults to false

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: inviteToChannel
operation.description: This method is used to invite a user to a channel. The calling user must be a member of the channel.

parameter.name: channel
parameter.description: Channel to invite user to.

parameter.name: user
parameter.description: User to invite to channel.

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listChannels
operation.description: This method returns a list of all channels in the team. This includes channels the caller is in, channels they are not currently in, and archived channels but does not include private channels. The number of (non-deactivated) members in each channel is also returned.

parameter.name: cursor
parameter.description: Paginate through collections of data by setting the cursor parameter to a next_cursor attribute returned by a previous request's response_metadata. Default value fetches the first "page" of the collection. See pagination for more detail.

parameter.name: excludeArchived
parameter.description: Exclude archived channels from the list

parameter.name: excludeMembers
parameter.description: Exclude the members collection from each channel

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the users list hasn't been reached.

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listGroups
operation.description:
Lists private channels that the calling user has access to.

This method returns a list of private channels in the team that the caller is in and archived groups that the caller was in. The list of (non-deactivated) members in each private channel is also returned.

parameter.name: excludeArchived
parameter.description: Don't return archived private channels.

parameter.name: excludeMembers
parameter.description: Exclude the members from each group

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listIms
operation.description: This operation returns a list of all im channels that the user has.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the users list hasn't been reached.

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listUsers
operation.description: This operation returns a list of all users in the team. This includes deleted/deactivated users.

parameter.name: includeLocale
parameter.description: Set this to true to receive the locale for users. Defaults to false

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the users list hasn't been reached.

parameter.name: presence
parameter.description: Optional Whether to include presence data in the output. Setting this to false improves performance, especially with large teams.

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: open-im
operation.description: This operation opens a direct message channel with another member of your Slack team.

parameter.name: user
parameter.description: User to open a direct message channel with.

parameter.name: includeLocale
parameter.description: Set this to true to receive the locale for this im. Defaults to false

parameter.name: returnIm
parameter.description: Boolean, indicates you want the full IM channel definition in the response.

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: postMessage
operation.description: This operation lets you post a message to a public channel, private channel, or direct message/IM channel.

parameter.name: channel
parameter.description: Channel, private group, or IM channel to send message to. Can be an encoded ID, or a name.

parameter.name: message
parameter.description: New text for the message. It's not required when presenting attachments.

parameter.name: attachments
parameter.description: An array of structured attachments. This field is required when not presenting text.

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: asUser
parameter.description: Pass true to post the message as the authed user, instead of as a bot. Defaults to false.

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: Set your bot's user name. Must be used in conjunction with as_user set to false, otherwise ignored.

parameter.name: iconUrl
parameter.description: URL to an image to use as the icon for this message. Must be used in conjunction with as_user set to false, otherwise ignored.

parameter.name: iconEmoji
parameter.description: Emoji to use as the icon for this message. Overrides icon_url. Must be used in conjunction with as_user set to false, otherwise ignored.

parameter.name: linkNames
parameter.description: Find and link channel names and usernames.

parameter.name: parse
parameter.description: Change how messages are treated. Defaults to none. See: https://api.slack.com/methods/chat.postMessage#formatting

parameter.name: replyBroadcast
parameter.description: Used in conjunction with Thread Time Stamp and indicates whether reply should be made visible to everyone in the channel or conversation. Defaults to false.

parameter.name: threadTimeStamp
parameter.description: Provide another message's ts value to make this message a reply. Avoid using a reply's ts value; use its parent instead.

parameter.name: unfurlLinks
parameter.description: Pass true to enable unfurling of primarily text-based content.

parameter.name: unfurlMedia
parameter.description: Pass false to disable unfurling of media content.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: renameChannel
operation.description:
This method renames a team channel.

The only people who can rename a channel are Team Admins, or the person that originally created the channel. Others will receive a "not_authorized" error.

parameter.name: channel
parameter.description: Channel to rename

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: New name for channel.

parameter.name: validate
parameter.description: Whether to return errors on invalid channel name instead of modifying it to meet the specified criteria.

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: renameGroup
operation.description: This operation renames a private channel.

parameter.name: channel
parameter.description: Private channel to rename

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: New name for private channel.

parameter.name: validate
parameter.description: Whether to return errors on invalid channel name instead of modifying it to meet the specified criteria.

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: unauthorize
operation.description: Deletes all the access token information of a given resource owner id so that it's impossible to execute any operation for that user without doing the authorization dance again

parameter.name: resourceOwnerId
parameter.description: The id of the resource owner which access should be invalidated

operation.name: update
operation.description:
This operation updates a message in a channel.

Ephemeral messages created by chat.postEphemeral or otherwise cannot be updated with this method.

parameter.name: channel
parameter.description: Channel containing the message to be updated.

parameter.name: message
parameter.description: New text for the message. It's not required when presenting attachments.

parameter.name: attachments
parameter.description: An array of structured attachments. This field is required when not presenting text.

parameter.name: timestamp
parameter.description: Timestamp of the message to be updated.

parameter.name: asUser
parameter.description: Pass true to update the message as the authed user. Bot users in this context are considered authed users.

parameter.name: linkNames
parameter.description: Find and link channel names and usernames. Defaults to none. This parameter should be used in conjunction with parse. To set link_names to TRUE, specify a parse mode of FULL.

parameter.name: parse
parameter.description: Change how messages are treated. See: https://api.slack.com/methods/chat.update#formatting

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: uploadFile
operation.description: This operation allows you to create or upload an existing file.

parameter.name: content
parameter.description: File contents

parameter.name: channels
parameter.description: List of channel names or IDs where the file will be shared.

parameter.name: fileName
parameter.description: Filename of file.

parameter.name: title
parameter.description: Title of file.

parameter.name: initialComment
parameter.description: Initial comment to add to file.

parameter.name: fileType
parameter.description: A file type identifier. See: https://api.slack.com/types/file#file_types

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.description: This method returns information about a member of a workspace.

parameter.name: user
parameter.description: User to get info on

parameter.name: includeLocale
parameter.description: Set this to true to receive the locale for this user. Defaults to false

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.name: primaryNodeOnly
parameter.description: Whether this source should only be executed on the primary node when runnning in Cluster

parameter.name: redeliveryPolicy
parameter.description: Defines a policy for processing the redelivery of the same message

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors
